name: Sonic Skylight
description:
This is a Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made in the coding website called Scratch! it is made to mimic adventure and unleashed gameplay, but in 2D. So, kind of like a Sonic Adventure 2D Edition. This game does have an official discord and GameJolt. You can also check out the scratch studio if you want.

Discord Server    Scratch Studio   GameJolt Community

The controls may be different depending on the version, but the current controls are arrow keys to move, and the a key to jump. This game is not currently available for mobile users, but a mobile version may be developed later. The Turbowarp file is 13mb, whilst the zip file is 26mb. Neither files sizes are too big, but if you want to save space on your computer, you should download the Turbowarp version.
